database.name: VIEW SIM_INVOICE_X_PARTIAL_V
database.view: SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE(a.c_invoice_id, '-') || COALESCE(a.c_order_id, '-') AS sim_invoice_x_partial_v_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, a.isactive, a.created, a.createdby, a.updated, a.updatedby, a.documentno, a.docstatus, a.em_sco_podoctype_comboitem_id AS podoctype_comboitem_id, a.em_sco_purchaseinvoicetype AS purchaseinvoicetype, a.em_scr_physical_documentno AS physical_documentono, a.c_bpartner_id, a.c_bpartner_location_id, a.m_pricelist_id, a.em_sco_newdateinvoiced AS newdateinvoiced, a.fin_paymentmethod_id, a.c_paymentterm_id, a.description, a.dateinvoiced, a.totalpaid, a.outstandingamt, a.dueamt, a.daystilldue, a.em_sco_firstduedate AS firstduedate, a.percentageoverdue, a.finalsettlement, a.daysoutstanding, a.updatepaymentmonitor, a.em_sco_dua_id AS dua_id, a.grandtotal, a.totallines, a.c_currency_id, a.ispaid, a.c_invoice_id, a.c_order_id FROM (SELECT i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, i.isactive, i.created, i.createdby, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.documentno, i.docstatus, i.em_sco_podoctype_comboitem_id, i.em_sco_purchaseinvoicetype, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.c_bpartner_id, i.c_bpartner_location_id, i.m_pricelist_id, i.em_sco_newdateinvoiced, i.fin_paymentmethod_id, i.c_paymentterm_id, i.description, i.dateinvoiced, i.totalpaid, i.outstandingamt, i.dueamt, i.daystilldue, i.em_sco_firstduedate, i.percentageoverdue, i.finalsettlement, i.daysoutstanding, i.updatepaymentmonitor, i.em_sco_dua_id, i.grandtotal, i.totallines, i.c_currency_id, i.ispaid, i.c_invoice_id, o.c_order_id FROM c_invoice i JOIN c_invoiceline il ON i.c_invoice_id = il.c_invoice_id JOIN c_orderline ol ON il.c_orderline_id = ol.c_orderline_id JOIN c_order o ON ol.c_order_id = o.c_order_id WHERE i.issotrx = 'N' GROUP BY i.c_invoice_id, o.c_order_id, i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, i.isactive, i.created, i.createdby, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.documentno, i.docstatus, i.em_sco_podoctype_comboitem_id, i.em_sco_purchaseinvoicetype, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.c_bpartner_id, i.c_bpartner_location_id, i.m_pricelist_id, i.em_sco_newdateinvoiced, i.fin_paymentmethod_id, i.c_paymentterm_id, i.description, i.dateinvoiced, i.totalpaid, i.outstandingamt, i.dueamt, i.daystilldue, i.em_sco_firstduedate, i.percentageoverdue, i.finalsettlement, i.daysoutstanding, i.updatepaymentmonitor, i.em_sco_dua_id, i.grandtotal, i.totallines, i.c_currency_id, i.ispaid UNION ALL SELECT i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, i.isactive, i.created, i.createdby, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.documentno, i.docstatus, i.em_sco_podoctype_comboitem_id, i.em_sco_purchaseinvoicetype, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.c_bpartner_id, i.c_bpartner_location_id, i.m_pricelist_id, i.em_sco_newdateinvoiced, i.fin_paymentmethod_id, i.c_paymentterm_id, i.description, i.dateinvoiced, i.totalpaid, i.outstandingamt, i.dueamt, i.daystilldue, i.em_sco_firstduedate, i.percentageoverdue, i.finalsettlement, i.daysoutstanding, i.updatepaymentmonitor, i.em_sco_dua_id, i.grandtotal, i.totallines, i.c_currency_id, i.ispaid, i.c_invoice_id, o.c_order_id FROM c_invoice i JOIN c_order o ON i.c_order_id = o.c_order_id WHERE i.issotrx = 'N' GROUP BY i.c_invoice_id, o.c_order_id, i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, i.isactive, i.created, i.createdby, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.documentno, i.docstatus, i.em_sco_podoctype_comboitem_id, i.em_sco_purchaseinvoicetype, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.c_bpartner_id, i.c_bpartner_location_id, i.m_pricelist_id, i.em_sco_newdateinvoiced, i.fin_paymentmethod_id, i.c_paymentterm_id, i.description, i.dateinvoiced, i.totalpaid, i.outstandingamt, i.dueamt, i.daystilldue, i.em_sco_firstduedate, i.percentageoverdue, i.finalsettlement, i.daysoutstanding, i.updatepaymentmonitor, i.em_sco_dua_id, i.grandtotal, i.totallines, i.c_currency_id, i.ispaid) a
